org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape

Interface PointDistributionModel.Constraint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PointDistributionModel.BoxConstraint, PointDistributionModel.EllipsoidConstraint, PointDistributionModel.NullConstraint
    Enclosing class:
    PointDistributionModel

    public static interface PointDistributionModel.Constraint
    Interface for modelling constraints applied to the scaling vector of PointDistributionModels so that generated models are plausible.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] apply(double[] scaling, double[] lamda)
      Apply constraints to a scaling vector so that it will generated a plausible model and return the new constrained vector.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        double[] apply(double[] scaling,
             double[] lamda)
        Apply constraints to a scaling vector so that it will generated a plausible model and return the new constrained vector.
        Parameters:
        scaling - the scaling vector to constrain
        lamda - the eigenvalues of the PointDistributionModel
        Returns:
        the constrained scaling vector
